Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Salutations, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I thought the time might be just about right.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why, for the carnations to bloom, of course.
You've been cultivating some, have you not?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be perfectly honest, I took the liberty of
dropping by to check on their growth every now
and then.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry I didn't mention it, but surely you can
understand my concern. It would hardly do if
the flowers you planted for me happened to wilt.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But it seems any worries I might have had were
misplaced. I expect they'll be flourishing today.
Shall we take a look?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Ah, just as I expected! They're in full bloom.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Magnificent! I've never seen such lovely
carnations! I'm speechless!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>How on earth did you cultivate flowers of such
beguiling beauty?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Hm? You simply raised them normally, with a
daily application of fertilizer to encourage
growth?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>I see... You invested your time to raise them the
good old-fashioned way. Truly, you grew them
with love!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Thank you for showing me such a beauteous
sight. I'm glad I asked you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Well, just as I figured, it's in bloom. Not bad, I
suppose.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>So, how did you cultivate it?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Mmm... You planted them and made sure to
water them daily. A sensible regimen, as
expected.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>No, no. There's nothing wrong with that. I
simply wanted to see what your outcome would
be.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Thank you. I've learned quite a bit from this little
analysis. I'm glad I asked you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Just as I expected, it's in bloom. And a lovely
blossom it is!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I assume you used normal fertilizer?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see, I see. No, that's quite all right. I was
simply curious what result your efforts would
produce.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you. What you've shown me today will be
a great help in the future. I'm glad I asked you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This should prove a great boon to my ongoing
research on carnations. A wonderful effort on
your part, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
When I publish the results of my research, I
promise you a prestigious place among my
citations.
<PAGE>
Now then, I ought to be off. Keep up the hard
work--you can be certain I will.
